name: Imperiales Classico Corona
additionalNotes: Handmade, long filler, selected tobaccos, incredible and creamy flavor, premium packaging with a very careful image, silky Connecticut wrapper from Ecuador, seven different formats to choose… All of this at a very low price Tasting notes Easy and pleasure smoke, with spicy notes in the beginning that goes down to release a very rich earthy taste with toasted and nutty notes. It’s a very creamy cigar that feels your mouth up with smoke due to an excellent draw
